channel.title: Please help!
channel.description: Hi. How to change that when i press punch it's attack xp, kick - strength and block - defence. I'm using Exion and it's wrong. When i choose punch my character kicks the monster and gets strength xp, when i choose kick, it punches monster and gets defence xp and when i choose block it punches monster and gets attack xp. And how to make that npcs and palyers can't walk throught the walls when in combat on the same PI Exion???

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @moperistas moperistas
item.description:
@moperistas wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:2, topic:420446”][quote author=moperistas link=topic=522993.msg3804493#msg3804493 date=1320342258]
Hi. How to change that when i press punch it’s attack xp, kick - strength and block - defence. I’m using Exion and it’s wrong. When i choose punch my character kicks the monster and gets strength xp, when i choose kick, it punches monster and gets defence xp and when i choose block it punches monster and gets attack xp. And how to make that npcs and palyers can’t walk throught the walls when in combat on the same PI Exion???
[/quote]

Answer to the npcs and players walking through walls: Fix clipping
The kick and attacks and stuff, its server sided thats all i can tell you that i know >.< i forget which files. Lol[/quote]How to fix clipping?

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

moperistas:

Hi. How to change that when i press punch it’s attack xp, kick - strength and block - defence. I’m using Exion and it’s wrong. When i choose punch my character kicks the monster and gets strength xp, when i choose kick, it punches monster and gets defence xp and when i choose block it punches monster and gets attack xp. And how to make that npcs and palyers can’t walk throught the walls when in combat on the same PI Exion???

Answer to the npcs and players walking through walls: Fix clipping
The kick and attacks and stuff, its server sided thats all i can tell you that i know >.< i forget which files. Lol

Read full topic
